item.description:
We had a great turnout for the first one, and for those who couldn't make it on Friday I promised I would plan one on a Saturday.  Well, here you have it.  Again from 6-8pm.  When we're closer, I'll give you my cell # just in case. 

Hope you can come out and join the group!  Plus, I want to meet everyone!

Stay warm until then!

Tonia

Hopefully this time I won't come down with the flu!
item.how_to_find_us: Next to Yankee Candle on America's Cup (parking is behind Panera Bread in parking for strip mall at beginning of lower Thames)
item.name: Another Relaxing Evening @ Panera Bread
